model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I have been learning how to play guitar so maybe I could play something for you when we meet for the barbecue.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Speaker A is a big country music fan who is sad that winter is ending, their favorite season. They live on a corn and bean farm with lots of animals and they like driving trucks and tractors. Speaker A loves BBQing and grilling steak and hotdogs.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A suggests Speaker B to come down and visit for blasting country music, and Speaker B wishes to live the country lifestyle down there. Speaker B plans to meet Speaker A in person after renovating their house and buying furniture safe for their two dogs.

Event Description:
Speaker A inspired to redecorate the house with purple furniture and neon pink and lavender walls. Speaker B regrets the green and purple scheme but plans to give Speaker A all purple stuff. Speaker A bought new furniture including a new couch, recliner, and patio furniture. Speaker A hopes to enjoy quiet evenings outside this summer and plans to grill and eat outside most nights when the weather permits. Speaker B offers to bring a new marinade and a six pack over for a BBQ gathering. Speaker A uses lamps to keep bugs away while enjoying food and company outside. Speaker A has bug spray as a backup plan, and Speaker B needs to get lamps and candles to keep bugs away.
